OOC: Sorry, that last mail was cut a bit short. The finish, is, I never rev=
olve around fighting. I'm always for character development. I've had some r=
eally good characters, before, better than any I've ever had in NBW. Howeve=
r, I ultimately decided they should die when I compared them to my DBZSF ch=
aracters and was disgusted. I'm working right now to alter my NBW character=
s for the better, thanks for your input, but it doesn't really matter, RPG =
is dead...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Legendarynemasis@...=
m 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, November 21, 2001 3:41 =
PM
  Subject: Re: Debate (important everyone read)


         You may have =
kept the people from going off Cybertron code, which would be unrealistic f=
or Cybertrons. If we could expand the RPG past one singular world then that=
 would create excitement and people would post more often as there would be=
 more to do. Storys could bloom and develop as charachter can interact with=
 new things. Rather then everyone just fighting each other all the time and=
 being fenced in. 
        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
              ADVERTISEME=
NT
             
       
       

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to=
 the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
